revised_title: Spectroscopic Observations of Lithium and Cesium
tldr: The authors investigate the absorption spectra of lithium and cesium vapors, measuring 41 lines in the lithium spectrum and 31 lines in the cesium spectrum. They discuss the challenges in measuring the wavelengths and oscillation frequencies, and present a formula to calculate these values. The study contributes to the understanding of atomic physics and the properties of alkali metals.
